name: Fate of the Empress
storyline: Your dear cousin, Xie Zhihan, has just become a concubine to the emperor. Her brother, Xie Weijin, is now a royal guard. You have secured a place in the palace due to your excellent skill in embroidery. Navigate the complex palace politics and climb the ranks as you adjust to your new life in the Royal Palace. The palace can be a dangerous place; with jealous concubines, framed murders, and so many other difficulties and obstacles. Use your wit and intelligence to uncover secrets and protect yourself and your loved ones.
summary: Set in ancient China, Fate of the Empress is a turn-based RPG that faithfully recreates a majestic imperial city. Get ready for palace intrigue, beautiful 3D graphics, and a tale of love told through stunning animated cutscenes and expansive, complex gameplay.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Fate of the Empress - Live Your Noble Life
